keyEvents.description: Nami discovers that Upper Yard was originally part of Jaya before being blasted into the sky 400 years ago
Gan Fall explains why Upper Yard is considered holy land due to its abundant vearth (soil)
Straw Hats celebrate Eve of Gold Festival with campfire party

characteristics.description: A large island fragment blasted into the sky from the Blue Sea 400 years ago, originally part of Jaya. Contains abundant soil (vearth) making it sacred to sky islanders and the ancestral homeland of the Shandia people.

keyEvents.description: Shandia warriors gather and resolve to reclaim Upper Yard after 400 years of exile

characteristics.description: The current settlement of the Shandia people in Skypiea, where they have lived since being expelled from their ancestral homeland of Upper Yard 400 years ago.
